parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The ABS warning light illuminates on the dashboard
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brakes fail to engage
the vehicle speeds up when brakes are applied
the emergency brake is required to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents or near-misses, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brakes fail to engage
the vehicle speeds up when brakes are applied
the emergency brake is required to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake hydraulic system can cause the brakes to fail, leading to accidents or near-misses, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brakes fail to engage
the vehicle speeds up when brakes are applied
the emergency brake is required to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the brakes can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, injuries, and potentially fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes do not respond when depressed
the vehicle does not slow down or stop when the brakes are applied
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the vehicle pulls to one side when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause loss of control, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, leading to accidents, injuries, and potentially fatalities.
symptoms: The steering wheel is difficult to turn
the steering wheel feels stiff or hard to turn
the vehicle does not respond to steering input
the power steering warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The tearing of the convertible top can lead to water leaks, wind noise, and decreased visibility, which can compromise the safety and comfort of the occupants.
symptoms: Tearing or ripping of the convertible top
typically at the rear of the car
water leaks
wind noise
decreased visibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended unlatching of the door can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The door unlatches without driver input
the door opens while driving
the door does not stay shut
the door hinges are loose or worn out.
